official_title: To repeal provisions of the Treasury, Postal Service and General Government Appropriations Act, 1992, relating to requirements for Federal agency leases in the Omaha, Nebraska-Council Bluffs, Iowa, geographical area.

summary.text: Amends the Treasury, Postal Service and General Government Appropriations Act, 1992 to repeal provisions relating to requirements for Federal agency leases in the Omaha, Nebraska-Council Bluffs, Iowa, geographical area.
